name: Gmail fitter happier
description:
Well, Gmail is the web application i use the most.
This is an experimental style to make it cleaner and easier on the eyes.
The goal is to reach a more clean and focused interface.

This should be usable from today but it's a work in progress. Contact me for bugs or suggestions. Comments and constructive cricicism appreciated.
additional_info:
• Brings Roboto font and the new app icon
• De-googleplusify the top bar
• Brings in a more minimal approach
• Minimal labels

V 0.2 (02/12/2014): bring some improvements. Now the code is commented for easier understanding.
V 0.3 (13/12/2014): seems google has changed some class.. update to make things work.
V 0.4 (17/12/2014): notification icon update
